Source: various documents including the US National Security Council memorandum number 68 issued in 1950
Polar_expression: has to be maintained at any cost

Source: It is possible that the United States itself planned this suicidal attack

text: It has been clearly mentioned in various documents including the US National Security Council memorandum number 68 issued in 1950 , that US supremacy has to be maintained at any cost . It can be derived from this that the US attack on Afghanistan without any logic , was not an impulsive action but the psychology of maintaining US supremacy was fully involved in it . It is possible that the United States itself planned this suicidal attack .
